Name: De Zotte
Review Text: The place was too crowded. The staff was not helpful, they looked too busy even to listen to us. The food wasn't great. At the end the lady at the till told me that I couldn't pay by debit card because in the Netherlands they don't accept visa or MasterCard. ( That was not correct as I paid everywhere with the same cards ).

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Excellent Dutch restaurant with nice vibe inside. The staff is super nice, friendly and speak English. The food is amazing and the portion size is more than enough. It has the authentic Dutch taste and loved it. However, the toilet seemed ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: My favourite bar in Amsterdam! A great vibe, superb selection of beers and friendly staff. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: This is one of my favourite hidden gems in the city center. The location on a back street makes it less crowded than other places at the expense of not having a terrace. Very good selection of beers and the food is tasty, the type you would expect from a cafe in Amsterdam. This is the place where I see myself becoming a regular.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Fantastic Belgium beer cafe with a huge selection of beers and a small food menu. Would recommend this to anyway who is a fan of special beer. Staff is knowledgeable and can advice what to drink.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Cozy place just a block or two down from Melkweg and Leidseplein. Lots of Belgian beers on the menu as well as food. I had the ‚ÄúDish of the Day‚Äù which was duck and enjoyed it.  Will definitely be back.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Stopped in here randomly, we were looking for a place to eat and thought it looked perfect. We were right on! One woman running the whole deal with someone in the back cooking. She was a total boss too, and really nice as soon as we could ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
Cozy place, there are several tables outside.
Nice selection of beers and the usual Dutch bites. Not crowded and far from the noise of Leidseplein.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
Have been here before and had a
delicious vegan burger so came back. Wasn‚Äôt disappointed the second time. If anything, the vegan sate was even more delicious. Great service, cozy atmosphere, ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Huge beer selection, friendly staff, but a little strict, didn't allow to take a chair out so you can sit with a beer and smoke, but they do have the most awesome steak ever üëç

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
This place deserves 5 stars!
I always struggle to find good places to eat but this pub was a game changer!
Had the special of the day which was ribeye steak. Out of this world! By far the ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Amazing selection from bottled and draft beer. Very cool place with nice ambient.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Wow! Fantastic place with such great options! Hope to go back soon. Delicious beer and great atmosphere. Wonderful and friendly service.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Cozy place, friendly staff, nice atmosphere! They also have a great selection of beers and tasty bitterbalen.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: So glad we decided to pop in here! The vegetarian cheese burger is so delicious I almost shed a tear. Vegan satay is gorgeous too. Lots and lots of beers to choose from. 10/10 great place will definitely be back before we leave!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Lovely cosy bar with a vast beer selection and tasty food

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great beers and great staff that know their stuff

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great atmosphere, splendid beer, very nice staff! Definitely recommended!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great little bar, with tons of choice, interesting glasses and nice d√©cor! Highly recommend. Good price to!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
First of all, I F++KING LOVE THIS PLACE!!

Review Text: Amazing variety of beers, everybody will find something for their own taste but most of all the food options are sooooo delicious!!!! The menu stretches beyond meat - Lots of vegan and vegetarian options. Vegan pizza makes your mouth all ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great variety of beers! Although a few were not available. Asked for my burger to be medium done, got it well done. Wasn't worth the hassle if returning it. Tasted good though

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Lovely bar with a great beer selection and lovely food. Good for all!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great selection of beers, and a nice atmosphere to enjoy them. The staff are friendly and very knowledgeable about the beers and also the food. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great beer selection, good food, and a cosy atmosphere. It gets crowded after 18:00, so make a reservation if you want a table. It's a tight space, so four is a good group size but six is pushing it. In general, there's only one person ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Must visit place for the lovers of Belgium beer. Huge amount of different bottles and several ones on tap.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Located on the quieter street, wide selection of beers and tasty food

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: A great and unique selection of Belgian Beers, one my favorite Belgian spots in Amsterdam. They also serve good steaks, and occasionally they have the rib-eye. You should definitely give it a try. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Nice Belgian pub - not many beers on tap, but significant bottled variety. Some food too, bitterballen are quite good. Overall it's a place of a vibe though, and the vibe is great!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Way overpriced! And the high prices come with attitude. Staff was incompetent and standard Belgium beers almost twice as expensive as in other bars in Amsterdam... The interior is great, it has soul. It's a pity they sold itl.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: We paid ‚Ç¨ 72 (3 people) for no meal. We asked twice (at different moments) whether our meals would be ready in time, because we had to leave for the theatre; twice they said it would be OK. But it took a long time and we were getting ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: I nice small pub serving a lot of great different beers a couple of minutes behind Leidseplein. They have a special beer glass for every brand but keep in mind that not all beer brands are always in stock so better check the beer list. Service is great and they help you choose a nice beer.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: This is a gem of a place. The atmosphere was warm and inviting. My wife and I split the steak and black bread and farmers cheese plate. Everything was too delicious to describe in words. Additionally, the selection of Belgian beers in this ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: This is one of the very best Belgian beer bars in Amsterdam and one of my favorites. So many good beers and such nice people. You can smoke when it's late so if you don't like that leave earlier. The food is good. The beers are great and they play good music! Busy days you should book a table.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: This bar has a very local feel. Many beers to choose from with equally variety of serving glasses. I only had the appetizers during my visit and they where delicious. I of course highly recommend bitterballen.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: I really like the place the staff is great and the beers are great! But.... the only thing that makes it three stars is that the food is changed since last time I bin here. I'm a qualified chef and with every bite I took of mine steak I ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great choice is Belgian beers, Nice staff. The food is coming with some delay, but tasty. Meal size is somewhere in the lower side of the spectrum.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great food; I always thought this was a real meat-eater place, BUT: they also have a lot of ( really excellent! ) VEGAN options. For instance; the vegan Satay... marvellous. Love it. ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great atmosphere, lively bar off the main streets. Great selection of draught and bottled beers (Kwak amber is fantastic) small menu but that's as it should be. Go for the Dutch cheese plate with hot fresh country bread and spicy beer sausage on the side.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: The bar as a whole is a quite good location. The interior looks really good and fits the style of the bar. The amount of beers is great, even with a house brand. When we were there they couple of times said they don't have the alcohol we ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: This is a great place to have a n authentic beer in Amsterdam.  The staff is quite rude and not caring but really what do you expect from student bar staff who drink for free. It's not accesible for wheelchair users.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Such an excellent bar! A classic Dutch/Belgian bar vibe and just round the corner from leidseplein. Come here rather than drinking at those tourist traps (and that's coming from a tourist). The barman was a genuinely sweet guy and very ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Smallish place. Not very good service. Asked the bar maid about Belgian sour beers. She said they didn't have any but on the way out I saw that they had 4 different ones. On a nice evening you want to sit outside but there's only two seats on the sidewalk that are always taken.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Good food, better beer, & great atmosphere. What more do u need?!  Gets busy and had the 1 waitress was on her own to tend to the whole place. Loved the bar cat that greeted everyone.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Nice intimate bar close to Leidseplein but not overcrowded. Beer is a bit expensive but the food isn't. Their Trappist cheese platter was abundant and very tasty.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: The other photos show the place well.  Where I come from this would be a dive bar...but where I come from, dive bars don't have such a great menu and beer selection.  Steak poivre (tender steak medium rare with pepper) and muscles in wine ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great brewery, with a huge selection (over 140), mostly belgian, but also a nice place for dinner. Small and cosy, with low ilumination. Their menu is quite reduced but the dishes surprisingly tasty for a place where the main focus is on ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Came to Amsterdam with my girlfriend and walked Into de zotte by accident. Came back every night since. The food was outstanding. One of the best steaks we have ever had. Martyne is so hospitable and made us feel very welcome. Great price and even greater food. Highly recommended

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Cosy Belgian beer caf√©. Decent selection, though nothing really surprising on the menu.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: One of the best Belgian beer bars in Amsterdam. Good selection of beers in a brown caf√© atmosphere. They have decent food if you come early.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Superb neighborhood eatery and the beer list is extensive.  We eat at De Zotte many many times when we visit, this year for a month.  A pic of us is even on Google that someone took of us Oct '18. We were sitting at the very front table and ‚Ä¶

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Awesome little Belgian beer bar tucked away in one of the side-streets of Amsterdam! The atmosphere is the best - local, welcoming to tourists, and with the nicest beers one can hope for!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Undoubtedly one of the best Belgian bars in Amsterdam. Every time we are in Amsterdam we make sure to have a few beers and some bitterballen in de Zotte. The staff is really knowledgeable about their beers, and each brand has a custom glass, as expected in a Belgian bar.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Best damn Belgian bar I've been to in forever. Service was fantastic, food was delicious. Super accommodating to us Americans. :)

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great selection of beers and good food. Good place to go for something to eat and stick around for a couple of hours. Don't forget to kiss the cook.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Super friendly staff, amazing cozy atmosphere (with a rockers vibe) and an amazing belgian craft cider with a very good looking menu as well! 10/10 would go again

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Very cosy and characterful Belgian beer bar serving decent food. Tucked away from the main touristy square (Leidesplein) nearby. Handy for pre and post gig beers if you're going to Melkweg!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Super cozy bar with lots of beers and really nice snacks

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: My wife and I stumble upon this place while in town for our anniversary. Very friendly staff, amazing beer, tasty bitterballen and a cosy atmosphere. We went on a Sunday evening so it wasn't too busy. Loved it.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Good selection of Belgian beers. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. A cosy, but small and crowded place, so there's always a chance of not getting in.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Lovely restaurant with delicious food.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
Great atmosphere, nice music, fantastic special beers....
What more do you need?! Big fan carry on with the good work!!
Till next time

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great food and drinks, go visit!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Excellent beer, plenty to choose from. Super friendly staff. Tasty bitterballen, trapist cheese with countrybread is a must. There is a lovely white cat (not lately ¬¨¬¨).

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Excellent bar and great food! Super top spot! And all the great beers you never tasted yet!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Very loud music and quite crowded. Food was decent. Selection of beers is very average and expensive. Of all the craft beer places in Amsterdam this one I enjoyed the least.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
A very nice pub with great service.
We ordered a plate with cheese and bread which was pretty expensive and we were a little disappointed so,  i dont recommend the food.  But the beers were great.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great selection of belgian beers, tiny place but interesting. Music can be loud sometimes which is not ok if you want to have a nice conversation

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: If you have a thing for Belgian beers, this is the place to go to. Nice staff, super selction of drinks and if it is too crowded you can always go thier sister bar down the street called Triple.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Awesome. Big selection of beers, very good food. Seems like I found a place to call home while in Amsterdam üòÅ

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Lots of specialty beers, knowledgeable and kind staff. Very nice place to sit and relax. It's not a huge place, so it's not always easy to find a table.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Interesting spot, good beer but would not recommend the food. Cozy atmosphere and good spot, just off Leidseplein (one of the most crowded places in Amsterdam) and still quiet and somehow special.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Amazing place for belgian beer. The staff is friendly and helpful. You get good option of veg/non-vegetarian food as well.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Enormous selection of beer and friendly staff, good food! Great value for ‚Ç¨

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Fell through this place during New year's Eve and although our party was quite  "happy" the bartender was really nice and understanding! Can recommend!

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: If you are looking for Belgium beer in Amsterdam, this is a great spot. The Trappist beer sampler is fantastic, but the ABVs of the beers make it not for the faint of heart

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Tasty beers (and a surprisingly nice cheese platter), while the ambience is perfect for both a get-together with friends or looking down the glass alone.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: One of the best bar in town, great selection of beer, awesome atmosphere with great music and stuff. They are helping you to choose from drinks...its not easy.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great place. Although small in size, it has an incredible atmosphere, very good steaks and obviously great beers. :)

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Nice place in the center of the city. It's usually crowded. It's a great option to go out for a drink, good beers. In general an interesting bar to hang out, but not the best option for dinner

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: The best place to find great Belgian Brew

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great spot for a good beer selection & a surprisingly vegan friendly pub menu. Ambiance is always lovely.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Absolutely outstanding. A local bar of a friend of ours from Amsterdam, and you have to just try it. Huge selection of beers and a some cracking IPAs too.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Must beer place. Great service, comfortable and also serves nice food with interesting specials every day.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text:
Great atmosphere, good food close to the Melkweg.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great place with amazing service. 10/10

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: A beer menu to keep any enthusiast happy. Great food and snacks. Proper pub atmosphere.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Very friendly and relaxed place,with some of the best beer I've tasted. Worth a visit for a quick drink or two.

Name: De Zotte

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Truly one of Amsterdam's finest bars. To the best of my knowledge, the only one to serve La Corne. If you thought the Kwak glass was the apotheosis of imbibing vessels, think again.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Awesome place, had delicious beers and the service was great. Ask their recommendations. You can't go wrong.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Cool bar, with a huge choice of high-quality beers. However, drinks are extremely expensive and there is really little space where to fit the crowd.

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Nice lively Belgium beer bar. Tasty food, too! It gets really busy on Fridays and Saturdays

Name: De Zotte
Review Text: Great atmosphere and selection of beers. The food is also very good...well worth a stop when you are in Amsterdam!

Name: De Zotte
